page.title: 07Entertainment in Eversley
page.content: Eversley has a population of about 1,5OO and we have no facilities for entertainment,so the village makes its own.In 1976 Mrs.Ivy Smith decided to form a choir to entertain local people.They are called{The Kingsley {Song Byrds.}Mrs. Smith is the conductor of the choir which is made up of local ladies. There are twenty-three members at the moment. They have performed at eighty-five concerts,rehearsing once a week at the Church Room. At their concerts they sing about twelve songs which they try to vary.Mrs.Smith organises the choir ordering the music and arranging the programme for their performances. The choir have sung in many places in the area, including Camberley, Hartley Wintney and Yateley.
